Class FlipFitSlotDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitSlotDaoImpl
public class FlipFitSlotDaoImpl extends Object
The `FlipFitSlotDaoImpl` class provides the data access layer for slot-related operations. It handles all database interactions for slot data, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting slot records.

  • Method Details

    • addSlot

      public int addSlot(Slot slot) throws SQLException
      Adds a new slot to the database.
      Parameters:
      slot - The `Slot` object containing the slot's details.
      Returns:
      The generated `slotId` of the newly added slot.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteSlot

      public int deleteSlot(int slotId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a slot record from the database using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected (should be 1 if successful).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • updateSlot

      public int updateSlot(Slot slot) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing slot record in the database.
      Parameters:
      slot - The `Slot` object with the updated details.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected (should be 1 if successful).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getSlotById

      public Slot getSlotById(int slotId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a `Slot` object from the database using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The `Slot` object if a matching record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getPendingSlots

      public List<Slot> getPendingSlots() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all slots with a pending status.
      Returns:
      A list of `Slot` objects that are pending approval.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getSlotsByGym

      public List<Slot> getSlotsByGym(int gymId, Date date) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all slots for a specific gym on a given date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym.
      date - The date for which to retrieve slots.
      Returns:
      A list of `Slot` objects for the specified gym and date.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getSeatsForUpdate

      public Integer getSeatsForUpdate(Connection con, int slotId) throws SQLException
      Locks a slot row for a transaction and returns the number of available seats. This is an internal helper method used for transactional booking to prevent race conditions.
      Parameters:
      con - The database connection for the ongoing transaction.
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to lock.
      Returns:
      The number of available seats if the slot is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • updateSeats

      public int updateSeats(Connection con, int slotId, int newSeats) throws SQLException
      Updates the number of available seats for a slot within a transaction.
      Parameters:
      con - The database connection for the ongoing transaction.
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to update.
      newSeats - The new number of available seats.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
